title: Firms with female participation in ownership (% of firms)
name: ic.frm.femo.zs
readme: Firms with female participation in ownership are the percentage of firms with a woman among the principal owners.

fields.description: ISO 3-digit ISO code extended to include regional codes e.g. EUR, ARB etc

fields.description: Firms with female participation in ownership are the percentage of firms with a woman among the principal owners.
